articles.title: Upgrades set to shake up F1's last place battle at Silverstone - The Race
articles.description: AlphaTauri will introduce a new floor during the British GP weekend as part of its efforts to lift itself off the foot of F1's 2023 standings.
articles.content: The AlphaTauri Formula 1 team will introduce a new floor during the British Grand Prix weekend thats characterised as the first upgrade that targets a significant improvement in what has been the big… [+5260 chars]
